about_the_game:
Defend your position and showcase your strategic precision!

In this thrilling action and survival game, you take control of a tank stationed at the intersection of four paths. Your goal is clear: shoot with precision to destroy the enemy ships advancing along each path.

Key gameplay mechanics:

  • Strategic shooting: Every shot counts. Fire only when necessary, as shooting more times than required will hit the city, and you’ll lose a life.

  • Time-sensitive defense: If an enemy ship reaches your position, you’ll lose a life. Stay calm and act quickly!

  • Endless waves: Face endless waves of enemy ships that will test your reflexes, strategy, and ability to hold out for as long as possible.

How long can you survive?

With simple yet challenging gameplay, this game will keep you on the edge of your seat as you plan every shot with precision. Perfect for those who love challenges and want to beat their own records!

name: Anti-Invasion Warfare

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: Processor X2 with support SSE2
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Microsoft Visual C++ Redistributable, .NET Framework
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5, AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Microsoft Visual C++ Redistributable, .NET Framework

short_description: Prevent alien ships from reaching your position. Avoid hitting human settlements by shooting only at the ships. Use multi-shot to hit several ships or nitro to move faster. Level up and beat the high score.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Romanian*
*languages with full audio support
